channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report E-2023070753
item.description:
Report E-2023070753

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: LAS CRUCES
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CIRCLE K
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On June 13, 2023, at 1006 ET, Circle K reported 50-gallons released from a cargo tank due a customer driving over the drop gun during a fuel delivery. ERTS dispatched GrayMar Environmental Services (GrayMar) to conduct all onsite clean up operations. Prior to GrayMar's arrival the fuel carrier laid down pads, then picked them up. GrayMar then sprayed Gold Crew P2 on the impacted area. GrayMar collect and containerized the pads into a 5-gallon poly bucket. All waste was taken offsite for disposal.
